chapter_description.p: The Memory Manager module provides tools for managing variables and memory in Nelson.
It supports variable creation, assignment, querying, and removal across different scopes, as well as handling global and persistent variables.
The module also enables memory inspection, variable locking, and listing of workspace contents, facilitating efficient and controlled memory usage in scripts and applications.

keyword.name: acquirevar
keyword.description: Acquires variable value from a specified variables scope.

keyword.name: assignin
keyword.description: Assignin value to a variable in a specified variables scope.

keyword.name: isglobal
keyword.description: Checks if a variable is global.

keyword.name: isvar
keyword.description: Check for the existence of an variable.

keyword.name: varislock
keyword.description: Checks if a variable is locked.

keyword.name: who
keyword.description: List variables in memory or in .nh5 or in .mat file.

keyword.name: whos
keyword.description: List variables in memory or in .nh5 or in .mat file with sizes and types.
